metadata.reference: Source: Wald, D. J., D. V. Helmberger, and T. H. Heaton (1991). Rupture Model of the 1989 Loma Prieta Earthquake from the Inversion of Strong-Motion and Broadband Teleseismic Data, Bull. Seism. Soc. Am. 81, 1540-1572.
